title: Project Skin Orb
body:
Hi, i just spent the past few days doing all of these quests to save up for a skin orb and what do i get, high noon yasuo, when i already have, high noon yasuo.

All of that effort and it gives me a skin i already have.... worth 195 orange... im a bit :''''''(

replies.body:
Just posted a thread on how frustrating it is to get the same shit over and over again
I feel you

Oh you thought Riot would actually be decent and not give you a chance to get the same skin you already have?

No this is Tencent Riot, you will take your duplicate and you will like it.
